isosensitivity: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1/3 EV. Can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.7, 1, or 2 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 6400; auto ISO sensitivity control available
dimensions: 131 x 328 x 176 mm (H x W x D)
accessoriesincluded: - EN-EL14 rechargeable Li-ion battery (with terminal cover) - ML-L3 Remote Control - MH-24 battery charger - AN-DC3 strap - UC-E17 USB cable - EG-CP16 audio/video cable - DK-5 eyepiece cap - BS-1 accessory shoe cover - DK-20 rubber eyecup - BF-1B body cap
effects: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified; storage for custom Picture Controls
exposuremodes: Auto modes (auto; auto (flash off)); programmed auto with flexible program (P); shutter-priority auto (S); aperture-priority auto (A); manual (M); scene modes (portrait; landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait; night landscape; party/indoor; beach/snow; sunset; dusk/dawn; pet portrait; candlelight; blossom; autumn colors; food); special effects modes (night vision; color sketch; miniature effect; selective color; silhouette; high key; low key)
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning.
cleaning: - Image sensor cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data
